document.full_text: an older, wiser stacy lewis is back in the hunt for a major title, holding the halfway lead at the kraft nabisco championship at mission hills.
document.title: golf roundup: lewis holds lead in l.p.g.a. major; wie is in contention
lines_and_colors: an older, wiser stacy lewis is back in the hunt for a major title, holding the halfway lead at the kraft nabisco championship at mission hills.
